tiled.core

Class MapLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tiled.core.MapLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectGroup, TileLayer

    public abstract class MapLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A layer of a map.
    See Also:
    Map

        dx - distance over x axis
        dy - distance over y axis

      • getMap

        public Map getMap()

      • setOpacity

        public void setOpacity(float opacity)
        Sets layer opacity. If it is different from the previous value and the layer is visible, a MapChangedEvent is fired.
        Parameters:
        opacity - the new opacity for this layer

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets the visibility of this map layer. If it changes from its current value, a MapChangedEvent is fired.
        Parameters:
        visible - true to make the layer visible; false to make it invisible

      • setOffset

        public void setOffset(int xOff,
             int yOff)
        Sets the offset of this map layer. The offset is a distance by which to shift this layer from the origin of the map.
        Parameters:
        xOff - x offset in tiles
        yOff - y offset in tiles

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of this layer.
        Returns:
        the name of the layer

      • getBounds

        public void getBounds(java.awt.Rectangle rect)
        Assigns the layer bounds in tiles to the given rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rect - the rectangle to which the layer bounds are assigned

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int x,
               int y)
        A convenience method to check if a point in tile-space is within the layer boundaries.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (x,y) is within the layer boundaries, false otherwise.

      • getOpacity

        public float getOpacity()
        Returns layer opacity.
        Returns:
        layer opacity, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Returns whether this layer is visible.
        Returns:
        true if the layer is visible, false otherwise.

      • mergeOnto

        public abstract void mergeOnto(MapLayer other)
        Merges the tile data of this layer with the specified layer. The calling layer is considered the significant layer, and will overwrite the data of the argument layer. At cells where the calling layer has no data, the argument layer data is preserved.
        Parameters:
        other - the insignificant layer to merge with

      • maskedMergeOnto

        public abstract void maskedMergeOnto(MapLayer other,
                   java.awt.geom.Area mask)

      • copyFrom

        public abstract void copyFrom(MapLayer other)

                  java.awt.geom.Area mask)

      • createDiff

        public abstract MapLayer createDiff(MapLayer ml)

      • copyTo

        public abstract void copyTo(MapLayer other)
        Unlike mergeOnto, copyTo includes the null tile when merging
        Parameters:
        other - the layer to copy this layer to
        See Also:
        copyFrom(tiled.core.MapLayer), mergeOnto(tiled.core.MapLayer)

      • isEmpty

        public abstract boolean isEmpty()

                       throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Creates a copy of this layer.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a clone of this layer, as complete as possible
        Throws:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
